name: NSApplication.ActivationOptions
desc: The following flags are for activate(options:).

items.name: static var activateAllWindows: NSApplication.ActivationOptions
items.desc: By default, activation brings only the main and key windows forward. If you specify NSApplicationActivateAllWindows, all of the application's windows are brought forward.

items.name: static var activateIgnoringOtherApps: NSApplication.ActivationOptions
items.desc: The application is activated regardless of the currently active app.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a new activation options structure.
